ThingDef.label: animal corpses generator
ThingDef.description: This building is only used to generate dead corpses of animal which fall into a cave well. It will remove itself once this is performed. This is a necessary trick as the fogGrid and homeArea prevent damaging pawns and forbidding their bodies during map generation.

ThingDef.label: villagers corpses generator
ThingDef.description: This building is only used to generate dead corpses of sacrificed villagers. It will remove itself once this is performed. This is a necessary trick as the fogGrid and homeArea prevent damaging pawns and forbidding their bodies during map generation.
